main event: Two unidentified objects were sighted on November 17, 1915 in the area between the towns of Yazd and Damghan, Iran.
interesting points: The first sighting lasted for 10 minutes and 15 seconds, while the second sighting lasted for 10 minutes and 45 seconds.
The objects were observed around 1742 local time, about 25 miles south of Highway 60, heading on the horizon at an angle of about 40 degrees up.
The objects were brighter than stars and emitted a white light.
The objects were observed again around 1915 local time, about 55 kilometers south of Yazd, on the same heading, but with less light intensity than before.
The objects returned to the horizon, leaving a white trail that was visible for 45 seconds.
